channel.title: Pages on Manas Gupta
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Manas Gupta

item.title: about
item.description: My name is Manas Gupta. I am a Production Engineer at Meta Platforms (formerly Facebook). Past jobs include - Yahoo!, Easilydo, Nuance. I focus on various aspects of “running” production infrastructure. I live in Montreal (Canada) with my wife and three kids. Need to reach me? hello@manasg.com
